about_the_game:
Critias Empire is a Turn-Based Strategy game where you build your empire without war, combat and rival civilizations. Instead danger comes from Disasters rained down by the Gods of Olympus.

This is a game for those who like the empire building of 4X games, as opposed to war and conflict, but still want a challenging dynamic world to play in.

In Critias Empire, the ancient Gods are vengeful and scheming. They will rain disasters down on your civilization, altering the map as volcanoes spew lava, floods wash away the land and earthquakes cause mountains to rise and crumble.

Each God has their own personality, desires and their own signature disaster. Give too much attention to Zeus and Poseidon may get angry, washing away your coastal settlements with a terrible storm!

Critias Empire rewards those who plan carefully or are quick to adapt. As disasters unfold, the changing map will present you with new opportunities and dangers:

Transport - Bind your empire together and allow it to flourish by connecting far flung lands and distant cities. Build a network of roads and sea routes, which in turn boosts production and allows your empire to flourish. Plan for the worst and create resilient networks as disasters can cut your transport links, turning them from a strength to a vulnerability.

Oracle - Call upon the mystics and soothsayers of your empire to divine the true intentions of the Gods. Pray to the Gods to intercede in times of trouble, or use your favour with the Gods to predict where disaster will strike and plan accordingly.

Festivals - Appease the Gods and delight your citizens with extravagent celebrations. Organise Festivals to boost empire production, but never forget the cost can, like a bad hangover, last well beyond the end of the festivities.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M @ 2.60GHz or equivalent AMD processor and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB nVidia GeForce GT460 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 CPU @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB nVidia GeForce GTX1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 Aspect Ratio at Full HD 1080p or QHD 1440p
